resources.string: This is a project made by Anas Siddiqui, Ashwin Srinivasan and Ujan Sengupta. We have aimed to produce an efficient and highly simplified application which can be used as a real-time teaching aid by junior-scale and senior-scale teachers alike. For college students, this application brings together a hassle-free and user-friendly shortcut to a variety of common units generally used in the classroom. The simple UI and the usage of toggle buttons drastically reduce the time taken by the user to adapt to the app. We believe that our application can genuinely be used as an important tool in an actual teaching environment.
1) Choose the desired field of measurement from the tabs on top. There are a total of 8 units.
